name: Duck Hunting Island Elite Challenge 2015 - 2016
description: Duck Hunter 2017 updated! Strange and fun duck hunter island.  Beautiful and challenging duck hunting simulator game fps. If you enjoy duck games, hunting and fishing games this game would be your call of the wild. If your have played deer hunting games or other hunting games you should download today for free and enjoy the hunt! Shoot em up in the air or snipe them on the ground. Hunting ducks is funner than skeet shooting games. Cool guns to unlock for maximum duck hunt action.
